channel.title: [525] Empire's Origin ~ Where it all began! - RS2HD
channel.description:
[font=Verdana][center][525] .:Empire's Origin:. [525]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2805t0j.png[/img] [color=teal][b]Introduction-[/b]
The main aim of this server is to create a stable, decent and enjoyable server, with both Player vs Player, Player vs NPC and Skilling properties. This is a repost of Project Volcanic Stability. (Because I've updated it more, and the last project thread had a bad layout) When i mean decent, I mean nice economy, no customs items, npcs, clients. Something to as close to RS2 as a private server needs to be.
[b]Base~[/b] RS2HD, edited by Luke132. (Build 2)
"Why am i not using JC-Scape? and Aim of Server"
This is a RuneScape Private Server. It has come to my notice that many people are ruining the work of rs2hd (Developed and Created by Graham) All the 525 Servers are based off x JC x.’s Release, because it had item equipping, basic combat, a better home area and a start on a normal Player Killing server.
Alongside that, it also had many different things as well, as it was based off Luke132's Version 1 release several bugs still remained and were left as the programmers turned 525's into a laugh, most people now think of 525's as "Oh let’s play [525] PvP". All 525's have become PvP servers, when people are spending their time perfecting combat; they're forgetting the normal aspects of an ordinary playable server, which comes in package for both skillers and player killers. Also, x JC x in the server there are many other things, Commands load from separate files (Makes me irritated) Many timers (Using events is more efficient) and some classes which don't function in the server at all.
I plan on making a fun and playable server that has both stability and a decent economy. Since I’ve realised many servers are going more and more away from the RuneScape theme, they're making a full on player killing server, which kind of gets boring... I hope I stay with this project and produce something worthwhile.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/rrqhwh.jpg[/img]
Stopped development on the above server, will start after exams. Converting some features In this to Final Fate.
As I said before, I've not quit.
[b]Update Log~[/b]
1/5/2009-
Started Project.
1/5/2009-
Made commands load from one file.
1/5/2009-
Added Banking, (Withdraw 1,5,10,All) Gathered a few packets.
2/5/2009-
HD and LD Support. (Fullscreen tabs are fuctional, updating client to fullscreen)
2/5/2009-
Added leveling up -
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2h6d2sg.jpg[/img]
Added skill requirements. Added weapon requirements.
5/5/2009-
Transferred RS2HD 3 way combat system. Working on NPC Combat (Begins)
7/5/2009-
NPC Combat complete! Defence animations and hits. (Not fully) Specials work on NPCs. Only melee yet.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/1tv2q0.jpg[/img]
8/5/2009-
Added private messaging frames (Credits to Mage_Owner) Added Ignoring.
Picture in thread somewhere!
Added private messaging.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/keitd2.jpg[/img]
10/5/2009-
Started PvP, (Transferred base helped lots) Defence animations for players and special effects, equipment bonuses. Added skulling head icon -
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/10rk93p.jpg[/img]
Fixed ground item (I don't know there was a bug)
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2zdvqt0.jpg[/img]
14/5/2009-
Added customising charecter, with saving. Will add to appearance change mage.
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/f050yq.jpg[/img]
15/5/2009-
Started ranged. Added arrow drawbacks and almost done with projectiles.
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/692tya.jpg[/img]
Finished projectiles. Working on arrow detection and deletion.
17/5/2009-
[color=teal]Working on trading, efficient base, every button working including X.
(Added available spaces thing, these pictures are outdated)
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/1t1z50.jpg[/img]
2nd trade screen -
Shows items, fixing the commands and trading with unknown is easy.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/a0xsoi.jpg[/img]
Above pictures are outdated!
18/5/2009-
Added NPC and Player dialouge (Fixed the head glitch - head would appear out of helmet.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/16hqidj.jpg[/img]
Credits Edu for frames.
Working on mining and smithing now, because they're my favourite skills!
19/5/2009-
Added Shopping, need someone to dump item prices...
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/295zwhz.jpg[/img]
And.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/j97b06.jpg[/img]
20/5/09
More information on Woodcutting~
[*]Higher woodcutting level, faster logs collecting. [*]Sends message when logs cut. [*]Better the axe, higher chances of faster woodcutting. [*]Trees level requirements. [*]Axe level requirements.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/abtoya.jpg[/img]
22/5/09
Features~
[ul][li]Catches fish, depending on your fishing level.[/li] [li]Correct fishing level requirements.[/li] [li]Correct fishing tool requirements (Rod, Lobster Pot)[/li] [li]Different emote for different fishes caught.[/li] [li]Correct RuneScape experience. (May edit)[/li] [li]All uses events. As all my skills.[/li] [li]Working fishing items, (Such as gloves which increase fishing experience)[/li] [li]Obvious but auto-fishes...[/li][/ul]
I don't know i still may be missing something. So it isn't complete.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/w9e16c.jpg[/img]
And-
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/30ubsia.jpg[/img]
24/5/09
Also began Smithing.
Started with Smelting.
[ul][li]Iron Ores have effect of not being turned into Bars.[/li] [li]All Ores have been added, with correct experience from each one.[/li] [li]Uses event system.[/li][/ul]
That's it from Smithing so far.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/33ngrbq.jpg[/img]
"Project Programmers"
~Originalpker
I don't plan on taking anyone in, sorry. I've realised that team projects sometimes don't work out, unless you know the person's talents and background. This source however will be released to public when completed or might be hosted for pubic play.
"Conclusion" This is a server which realises both the needs of the players and the needs of the server on the whole, it'll bring a revolution to 525's and continue the stability of rs2hd.
"Requests/Help"
Item price dumps, from the Grand Exchange database, Thank you!
"Suggestions"
If you'd like to suggest something, complain on something feel free. I'm always happy to hear points of view.
"Server Website"
The server website will only have information about the server. It will host updates and future development.
[b]Thank you.
Originalpker~[/b][/center]

item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:47, topic:279248”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=368557.msg2849380#msg2849380 date=1246458964]

Looks hot. Never release this. It will be the Deltascape of 525’s. I know it sounds appealing now but you’ll be pissed when 100,000 copies of your server are running and ya, just don’t release it.

everything should always be released, a learning community cannot learn from a closed source project or one where they cannot even see the source
[/quote]

so he’ll release bits and pieces of the source and explain what they do. If he releases as a whole, they’ll do nothing.[/quote]
thats their choice to not learn but for those that wish to learn they cannot

Read full topic

item.title: [525] Empire's Origin ~ Where it all began! - RS2HD
item.dc:creator: @Bluekash Bluekash
item.description:
@Bluekash wrote:

Dude this is completely insane. You’re the only person I’ve seen that could actually make Moparscape look better than Runescape. I bet that JaGeX ltd. would hire you for coding on Runescape if they saw this highly complicated, finely tuned, amazing client. By the way some people like to play minigames, so…if you wouldn’t mind…that would be kind of nice. I’m not saying put minigames on it, but it would be nice. Oh, and when you make the Dragon Claws special attack make it like Runescapes. Because I’ve seen way too many servers that messed up on the Dragon Claws special attack and alot of people quit the server because of the it. If you’re wondering, the Dragon Claws special attack is called “Slice and Dice” and it hits 4 hits. The 1st hit is any random number(But it usually hits high because the Special is more accurate), the 2nd hit is half the 1st hit, and the 3rd and 4th are half the 2nd hit. A couple of examples would be: 20,10,5,5 or 36,18,9,9 or 41,20,10,10 or 27,13,6,6 and the hits always round down(33,16,8,8 or 34,17,8,8). By the way, if the first hit is 1 or 0 then the last hit ALWAYS hits between 30 and 44. Example: 1,0,0,31 or 1,0,0,43 or 0,0,0,32 or 0,0,0,44. Please dont mess up on the claws special (I know you won’t because your that good). But anyways good luck with Empire’s Origin. YOU OWN

Read full topic

item.title: [525] Empire's Origin ~ Where it all began! - RS2HD
item.dc:creator: @originalpker originalpker
item.description:
@originalpker wrote:

Flawless Cooking

Original~

And-

Cooking work with fires, ranges, most objects i’ve came across worldwide.
Had delays between cooking, and also corrent experience per item cooked.

There is something wrong with the inventory though, it rearranges them with cooking?

Anyway, all my skills use events :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2009, 03:16:03 pm[/size][hr]Began Fishing.

Features~

[ul][li]Catches fish, depending on your fishing level.[/li]
[li]Correct fishing level requirements.[/li]
[li]Correct fishing tool requirements (Rod, Lobster Pot)[/li]
[li]Different emote for different fishes caught.[/li]
[li]Correct RuneScape experience. (May edit)[/li]
[li]All uses events. As all my skills.[/li]
[li]Working fishing items, (Such as gloves which increase fishing experience)[/li]
[li]Obvious but auto-fishes…[/li][/ul]

I don’t know i still may be missing something.
So it isn’t complete.

And-

Also began Smithing.

Started with Smelting.

[ul][li]Iron Ores have effect of not being turned into Bars.[/li]
[li]All Ores have been added, with correct experience from each one.[/li]
[li]Uses event system.[/li][/ul]

That’s it from Smithing so far.

Originalpker~

Read full topic
